summary: A group of people start a business where they impersonate the recently deceased in order to help their clients through the grieving process.
cast: Angeliki Papoulia|Aris Servetalis|Johnny Vekris|Ariane Labed|Sofia Aivathiadou|Efstathia Angeli|Ilias Antzoulatos|Giorgos Athanasopoulos|Tasos Bahouros|Dimitris Bosinakos|Niki Diagoupi|Giorgos Diamantis|Efthymis Filippou|Labros Filippou|Dimitris Fryliggos|Despoina Fryliggou|Nikos Galgadis|Kostas Garyfis|Hristos Gavriil|Manolis Gerapetritis|Lila Gerolymatou|Viktoria Haitoglou|Dafni Ioakeimidou-Patakia|Evdokia Kalamitsi|Nikos Kolovos|Anna Kolovou|Maria Kontogiorgi|Dionysios Kostakis|Giannis Koutas|Maria Kyrozi|Vicky Lyra|Froso Makri|Lefteris Mavrianos|Hristina Mavrianou|Antonis Moulas|Angeliki Nikolaou|Themis Nikolaou|Angelos Palmos|Kostas Papadakis|Nikol Papakonstadinou|Tina Papanikolaou|Sotiris Papastamatiou|Thanos Papastergiou|Konstadina Papoulia|Klimis Pashalidis|Stavros Psyllakis|Jacquelina Carmen De Los Rios|Evangelos Stefanatos|Eftychia Stefanidou|Nikos Theodosakis|Despoina Varelidou|Maria Vasilopoulou|Tonia Vathioti|Eleni Velissaridou|Tasos Volvas|Fotis Zahos|Vasilis Zaziras|Yorgos Zois
title: Alps
